title: Sister Raven
description: WINNER: Independent Book Award/Fantasy: "A powerfully written story mixing old magic and Native American lore, Sister Raven kept our genre enthusiast judges captivated page after page."Bound by magic to Old Mother, Beetle Girl lives a lonely life on the fringes of her Native American society. When forced into the role of Keeper of the Ravens, she must break the bonds of her cruel mother, confront a powerful shape-shifter who threatens to destroy the village, and solve the mystery of her past.
author: Karen Rae Levine
